comment.author: 26808453@N03
comment._content:
I wonder if Beechworth's post office is in the the same location today?
- Emma

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/nationalmediamuseum] This wooden Post Office of 1853 burned down and was replaced by the current building in 1869-70, presumably on the same prominent corner in the centre of the town. I have not been to Beechworth myself but a stroll/slide around the streets with GoogleMapsStreetView reveals that most of the old buildings in this wonderful series have been replaced by more permanent structures. Wikipedia - en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beechworth#History Post Office - www.beechworth.com.au/Beechworth-History/Historic-Beechwo... GoogleMapsStreetView

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Something slightly spooky! - the clock in streetview is a couple of minutes earlier (15:30), so it is interesting to compare the shadows.
